class_description: An exception thrown when an error occurs during parsing. This exception includes the text being parsed and the error index.

params.param_description: the message to use for this exception, may be null
the parsed text, should not be null
the index in the parsed string that was invalid, should be a valid index

Methods.method_description: Constructs a new exception with the specified message.

params.param_description: the message to use for this exception, may be null
the parsed text, should not be null
the index in the parsed string that was invalid, should be a valid index
the cause exception, may be null

Methods.method_description: Constructs a new exception with the specified message and cause.

return_description: the index in the parsed string that was invalid, should be a valid index

Methods.method_description: Returns the index where the error was found.

return_description: the string that was being parsed, should not be null.

Methods.method_description: Returns the string that was being parsed.
